attributes.action: Prevent all UK prisoners from voting
attributes.additional_details:
Support this petition to encourage the UK government to maintain a ban on any prisoner serving a custodial sentence from voting in all local, national and EU elections and referenda.  This maintains the status quo of disenfranchisement.

Help to prevent the unwelcome intrusion of the European Court of Human Rights into UK domestic affairs, not the original intention of the legislation.
